main event: Witnesses reported seeing an oval-shaped object in the sky in Brooklyn, New York on 3 August 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as being light to dark grey in color with a dull finish., It was estimated to be approximately 20-25 feet in length., Witnesses observed the object for approximately 10 minutes before it disappeared to the west., The sighting occurred under clear weather conditions., The object was reported to move erratically with sudden changes in direction and speed.
